text:
type:
**^hi** to say hi
**^get <username>** to get <username>'s rating and its history
**^graph <username>** to get <username>'s rating graph
**^top** to list all participants with its ratings sorted descendingly
**^score** to see currently running duel scoreboard
**^help** to be stupid
**^gamble <amount> <A or B>** to gamble for team A or B as much as amount
